eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay

Class LongPressOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Overlay
      • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.views.overlay.LongPressOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.views.util.constants.OverlayConstants

    public class LongPressOverlay
extends org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Overlay
    A class to handling the long press gesture on the map(over 1000ms). You only have to Override the OnLongPress(MotionEvent event) method.
    Author:
    Dylan Stenico
